    public class MapActivity
extends FreeturiloActivity
    An activity displaying a map with marked stations and user-favourite locations.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miko≈Çaj Terzyk
    See Also:
    FreeturiloActivity, Station, Favourite

        public MapActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called when this activity is created.

        Calls FreeturiloActivity.onCreate(android.os.Bundle). Initializes the layout of this activity and registers this activity for future ask for system location module permissions. Sets locationPermissionRequest.

        Overrides:
        onCreate in class FreeturiloActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - unused parameter, included for compatibility with AppCompatActivity
        See Also:
        ComponentActivity.registerForActivityResult(androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContract<I, O>, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultRegistry, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCallback<O>)

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        Called when this activity is resumed.

        Starts a loading animation and begins asynchronous data transactions: retrieving the map from Google Maps API, stations from api and favourites from storage.

        Overrides:
        onResume in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        See Also:

      • onMapReady

        private void onMapReady​(@NonNull
                        com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap)
        Called when map is retrieved.

        Clears markers, sets the map and its style, moves map camera to the center of Warsaw, adds map click, long click and marker click listeners, clears focus.

        Parameters:
        googleMap - a retrieved map
        See Also:
        unfocus(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng), GoogleMap

      • onMapReadySync

        private void onMapReadySync​(@NonNull
                            com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap,
                            @NonNull
                            Synchronizer... synchronizers)
        Called when map is retrieved.

        Calls onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap) and decrements Synchronizers.

        Parameters:
        googleMap - a retrieved map
        synchronizers - a list of synchronizers to be decremented when onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap) finishes
        See Also:
        onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap), Synchronizer.decrement()

      • showStationMarkers

        private void showStationMarkers()
        Places and displays markers of stations on the map. Called when both stations and map have been retrieved (via a Synchronizer).

        Places a marker for each station on the map, assigns a station to each marker and populates markers. Moves map camera to show all station markers and stops the loading animation.

        See Also:
        FreeturiloActivity.stopLoadingAnimation(), GoogleMap.addMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.MarkerOptions)

      • showFavouriteMarkers

        private void showFavouriteMarkers()
        Places and displays markers of favourites on the map. Called when both favourites and map have been retrieved (via a Synchronizer).

        Places a marker for each favourite on the map, assigns a favourite to each marker and populates markers.

        See Also:
        GoogleMap.addMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.MarkerOptions)

      • findMarkerByLocation

        @Nullable
private com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker findMarkerByLocation​(@NonNull
                                                                      Location location)
        Finds a marker that has a location assigned.

        For each marker in markers compares its tag to a location.

        Parameters:
        location - a location
        Returns:
        a marker that has the location assigned or null if no such marker is found

      • hideActionButton

        private void hideActionButton​(int buttonId)
        Hides an action button.

        Changes visibility of the action button and removes its location assignment.

        Parameters:
        buttonId - an integer equal to the resource identifier of an action button

      • hideActionButtons

        private void hideActionButtons()
        Hides all action buttons.

        Changes visibility of all action buttons and removes all of their location assignments.

        See Also:
        hideActionButton(int)

      • showActionButton

        private void showActionButton​(int buttonId,
                              @Nullable
                              Location location)
        Shows an action button.

        Changes visibility of an action button and assigns a location to it.

        Parameters:
        buttonId - an integer equal to the resource identifier of an action button
        location - a location to be assigned to the button

      • showActionButtons

        private void showActionButtons​(@Nullable
                               Location location)
        Shows action buttons for a given focus.

        If focus is cleared, shows a device location button. If focus is on a user-favourite location, shows an edit favourite and a delete favourite button. If focus is on a station, appropriate station state buttons. Assigns the location having focus to shown buttons.

        Parameters:
        location - a location that has focus or null if focus is cleared
        See Also:
        showActionButton(int, com.example.freeturilo.core.Location)

      • unfocus

        private void unfocus​(@Nullable
                     com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng)
        Clears focus.

        Updates bottom panel to be in default state and shows default action buttons.

        Parameters:
        latLng - unused parameter, a point on the map clicked to unfocus or null if focus clear has not been obtained with a map click
        See Also:
        updateBottomPanel(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String), showActionButtons(com.example.freeturilo.core.Location)

      • focus

        private boolean focus​(@NonNull
                      com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        Changes focus after a map Marker click.

        Moves map camera to show a marker. If marker has no location assigned, clears focus. Else, updates bottom panel to show the location's details and shows action buttons for the location.

        Parameters:
        marker - a clicked marker
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the focus has been given to a location
        See Also:
        unfocus(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng), updateBottomPanel(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String), showActionButtons(com.example.freeturilo.core.Location)

      • updateBottomPanel

        private void updateBottomPanel​(@NonNull
                               java.lang.String textPrimary,
                               @Nullable
                               java.lang.String textSecondary,
                               @Nullable
                               java.lang.String textTertiary)
        Shows a text content on the bottom panel.

        Sets primary, secondary and tertiary text on the bottom panel. If one of the specified secondary and tertiary texts is not null, shows a horizontal rule between where secondary and tertiary texts would be.

        Parameters:
        textPrimary - a string equal to the main, large text on the bottom panel
        textSecondary - a string equal to the secondary, small text on the bottom panel or null if no text should be set as secondary
        textTertiary - a string equal to the tertiary, small text on the bottom panel or null if no text should be set as tertiary

      • addFavourite

        private void addFavourite​(@NonNull
                          Favourite favourite)
        Adds a favourite location. Called when the AddFavouriteDialog finishes with a positive button click.

        Adds the favourite location to favourites, places and displays its marker on the map. Populates markers, gives the favourite location focus and saves favourites to storage.

        Parameters:
        favourite - an added favourite location
        See Also:
        focus(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker), showAddFavouriteDialog(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng), AddFavouriteDialog, StorageConnector.saveFavouritesAsync(java.util.List<com.example.freeturilo.core.Favourite>, com.example.freeturilo.storage.StorageHandler)

      • showLocationPermissionsDialog

        public void showLocationPermissionsDialog​(@NonNull
                                          android.view.View view)
        Shows a dialog requesting system location module permissions if they have not been yet granted. Else, shows a location services dialog or locates the device. Called when the device location action button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        view - unused parameter, the device location action button
        See Also:
        showLocationServicesDialog(), locationPermissionRequest, processLocationPermissionsRequestResult(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Boolean>)

      • processLocationPermissionsRequestResult

        private void processLocationPermissionsRequestResult​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> result)
        Processes location module permissions request result and shows a location services dialog if granted. Called when the device location action button is clicked, after location module permissions dialog finishes.
        Parameters:
        result - a map with booleans assigned to permissions, indicating whether each of them was granted
        See Also:
        showLocationServicesDialog()

      • showLocationServicesDialog

        private void showLocationServicesDialog()
        Shows a dialog requesting turning on the system location module if necessary. Else, locates the device. Called when the device location action button is clicked and location module permissions are granted.
        See Also:
        locateDevice()

      • locateDevice

        private void locateDevice()
        Starts a retrieval of device location. Called when the device location action button is clicked, location module permissions are granted and the module is turned on.
        See Also:
        showDeviceLocation(android.location.Location)

      • showDeviceLocation

        private void showDeviceLocation​(@Nullable
                                android.location.Location location)
        Shows device location on the map. Called when device location is retrieved.

        Places a device location marker on the map and moves map camera to show the marker.

        Parameters:
        location - a retrieved device location
